DOC.brief_summary: Stress primary reason vitro fertilization ( IVF ) patient drop treatment , may detrimental impact pregnancy rate , yet minimal publish research efficacy structure skills-based psychological intervention assist reproductive technology ( ART ) patient . The objective study determine woman randomize mind/body ( MB ) program prior start first IVF cycle high pregnancy rate control ( C ) . This randomize , control prospective study conduct private academically-affiliated infertility clinic include 143 woman age 40 scheduled undergo first IVF cycle . Subjects randomize via computer generate random number table 10 session mind/body program control group follow two IVF cycle . The primary outcome measure clinical pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: Female Boston IVF infertility patient Age 2140 year Day 3 FSH level 12 mIU/ml Day 3 E2 level 80 pg/ml Using egg ( egg donor ) Daily access internet Able read , understand , sign inform consent English Prescription antipsychotic medication Diagnosis borderline narcissistic personality disorder Previous participation MB group
